alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 04 at 4:00PM CDT until November 04 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LAMAR AND EASTERN FANNIN COUNTIES... At 359 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Honey Grove, or 15 miles east of Bonham, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Paris, Honey Grove, Dodd City, Powderly, Sumner, Lake Gibbons, Crockett Lake, Arthur City, Coffee Mill Lake, Pat Mayse Lake, Camp Maxey, Bonham State Park, Lake Crook, Forest Hill, Ladonia, Pecan Gap, Windom, Telephone, Cotton Center and Midcity. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Texas.
